Title: Includes coverage for menstrual products under the supplemental nutrition assistance program
Summary: Provides an additional monthly public assistance allowance of $15 for menstrual products, including but not limited to, tampons, sanitary napkins, cups and panty liners.
LawCode: Amd ยง131-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to providing an additional monthly allowance for menstrual products under public assistance
